DOC.brief_summary: Objective : compare blood glucose insulin response consumption 100ml water , sweeten 25gr Zusto® 100ml water sweeten 25gr Glucomedics® ( standard drink )
DOC.detailed_description: This experimental study enrol 10 healthy female subject . The study compare blood glucose insulin response consumption 100ml water , sweeten 25gr Zusto® 100ml water sweeten 25gr Glucomedics® ( standard drink ) . Subjects need fast least 8 hour visit . At visit 1 , five woman consume solution 25gr Zusto® , five solution 25gr Glucomedics® . On visit 2 , group switch . Visit 1 2 perform within approximately one week interval . Both drink identical amount water different use 25gr Glucomedics® 25gr Zusto® . Before intake drink , vital sign , weight bedside blood glucose baseline blood sample - 15 ' 0 ' glucose , insulin C-peptide take visit 1 2 . Both drink consume within 5 minute time start end intake Zusto® / Glucomedics® document . Blood sample glucose , insulin C-peptide take 15 ' , 30 ' , 60 ' , 90 ' , 120 ' 180 ' start intake 25gr Zusto® 25gr Glucomedics® .
DOC.criteria: Female subject Age 30 50 year BMI 20 30 kg/m² No first degree relative mellitus type 1 type 2 No intake medication influence blood glucose level Pregnant , breast feeding planning become pregnant study Employer investigator study center direct involvement propose study study direction investigator study center
